name: Follower (OmKaBo)
description: This is a small project that I have been working on. It is in the early stages of development and will be updated when I have the time to work on it. The multiplayer of the game is mainly LAN focused right now but matchmaking can be used if the players using it are in communication. It is currently in a state of a free for all but I am looking into making it a more unique type of shooter game. I have fun working on this game but seeing as how I need to make money for life things I can't work on it as much as I wish to.
